chapters.title: Chapter 12:  A Morning of Victory
chapters.info: Nuhel Dromand, p. 232 (288)—One of Myrelle's four Warders. He also serves as a husband to her. He is dark-skinned and bulky with a curly beard with a bare upper lip. He is one of the Warders Myrelle saved; his first mistress died. See also Berengari, Myrelle.
